short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear browsing history and cached data using a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Clear Session is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to help you maintain your privacy and optimize your browsing experience by easily clearing your browsing data. With Clear Session, you have the flexibility to selectively delete your browsing history, cached data, and cookies over various time ranges, all with just a few clicks.

Key Features:

Customizable Time Range: Choose from predefined options to clear data from the last hour, last 24 hours, last 7 days, last 4 weeks, or all time.
Selective Clearing: Two dedicated buttons allow you to clear only your browsing history or clear all data, including history, cached data, and cookies.
User-Friendly Interface: An intuitive and sleek design ensures a seamless user experience.
Instant Feedback: Receive immediate confirmation messages after data has been cleared, ensuring you know exactly when the task is completed.
Enhanced Privacy: Protect your privacy by regularly clearing your browsing data, preventing unwanted tracking and data accumulation.
How It Works:

Select Time Range: Use the dropdown menu to choose the desired time range for data deletion.
Choose Data to Clear: Click on "Clear History" to delete only your browsing history, or select "Clear All Data" to remove history, cached data, and cookies.
Receive Confirmation: A message will appear confirming that the selected data has been successfully cleared.
